title: The Laugh Supper
description: THEY'RE BACK!Famous funny minds comment on the 21st century!Nine famous personalities admired for their wit and wisdom attend history's most entertaining dinner party! Present are Leonardo da Vinci, Ralph Waldo Emerson, Presidents Abraham Lincoln and John F Kennedy, Groucho Marx, Mae West, Dr Martin Luther King Jr, Dorothy Parker and John Lennon.A dynamic dinner conversation - sparkling with laughter and amazing ideas! Entertaining repartee. Humorous and perceptive observations on 21st century life. All these visitors have the gift of the gab. Many also have the gift of the gag! They travelled across the space-time continuum to make a comic contribution to THE LAUGH SUPPER: history's wittiest war of words and wisdom.What would Groucho Marx have thought of you? Find out by reading the decade's most hilarious book, THE LAUGH SUPPER - the book that turns time inside out!
author: Leonard Ryzman
